text: Anthony David Ford (1942 â€“ 31 January 2020) was a New Zealand lawyer and jurist. He was a judge of the Employment Court of New Zealand and Chief Justice of the Kingdom of Tonga from 2006 to 2010. He was born in Hokitika on the West Coast of the South Island. He died on 31 January 2020. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:New Zealand judges Category:New Zealand lawyers Category:New Zealand politicians
title: Tony Ford (judge)
